page.title: 14 Bury Lido
page.content:
The lido, off Milner Ave. was opened to the public in 1968. It was intended to provide enjoyment for all ages to be used for boating, and swimming. Unfortunately the people of Bury did not look after the ammenity and it fell into disrepair and was eventually drained.
Howvever in the last few years efforts have been made to restore it. Swimming is no longer allowed. Jason in our class says his brother put 5 small goldfish into the lido and they have now grown to between 20 & 30 centimetres long.
My mum will not let me play round the lido because she says there are too many teenagers about.
